storyInfo: Capone betrayed Gambino. Mostima rescued Bison. The Rat King revealed his true nature. The breeze in Lungmen blows gently.

attributes.content: ...I always thought I was a pretty great Messenger.
I delivered packages, letters and such.
Sometimes they were sentimental, something they were valuable. Every once in a while, they were ruinous.
My father is an amazing man. He moved from Minos to Lungmen and founded Mountain Dash Logistics.
Profit, mutual interest, flattery.
These are complicated things, and kind of annoying to deal with, but I push myself.
My father once told me...
The other side of the world will be even more dazzling.
...Mmm! Where am I...?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: What're you mumblin' back there?!
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Quiet down, if you don't want a shiner.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Once the boss is done with the Penguins, he'll decide what to do with you.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: (I... these guys took me... is Texas still fighting the mafia with the rest of Penguin Logistics?)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (Shit... Why aren't I more useful... I'm an MDL Messenger...)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (...The car stopped.)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: It's us. The boss got the Forte kid...
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Wait, what're you doing?!
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Mr. Capone's orders.
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: Capone? These are the boss's orders! Who does he think he is...?
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Who do I think I am?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Hello, MDL princeling.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: This is our chance to be formally introduced.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: ...You shot your own man?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Punishing traitors ain't against the rules in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: That's not what I meant... what are you going to do with me?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Make a trade.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: It's pretty simple. Gambino's tough guy act is gonna destroy the Family for the sake of some so-called glory.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I don't want that. Lots of people don't want that. Who wants to die for no good reason?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: So what?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: So I'm gonna help you with Gambino.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I don't trust you.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...And I can help you deal with Penguin Logistics.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I ain't stupid. I been in Lungmen a long time. I made a lotta preparations.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Your father's an important man who owns over seventy percent of the private Messenger business in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: And he's got some strategic cooperation with the highest levels of Lungmen's government.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: No matter which way you look at it, Penguin Logistics is the biggest obstacle to your business success.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Our goal is to take over all channels of Penguin Logistics. Do us this favor, and we can talk business again.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: My father and Mr. Emperor have a very close relationship. I'm sorry, but you've played this all wrong.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: MDL is a very big company. Your father alone really has the final say?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I think you're underestimating us. It's true the Family has been through some tough times...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But in days gone by, our ancestors sat around the dark tables of Siracusa and proudly called themselves 'Sicilian.'
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Power shifts, blood's spilled, and I'm all ears.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Honestly, what do the people around your dad think of Penguin Logistics? What about Lungmen?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: And what do you think?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: ...You sure talk about family a lot for a man who just killed his own kin.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You think I'll take your deal?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: His death was purely... business.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Yeah. Who knows if you pay in cash or bombs.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry, I thought you'd be a little more mature. But here you're gonna throw your life away for some little thing that ain't got nothin' to do with you.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You're scared. You're supposed to be some big shot MDL executive, but you ain't nothin' but a spoiled little brat.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: ...Sorry. Young Minoans are famous for their boldness.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Looks like you ain't gonna change your mind.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: If you'd lived, you'd see a lot more of this kind of thing. Too bad this is the end of the road for you.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: (Grrr...! How is this rope so strong. I'm running out of time!)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: If you die, MDL'll have no choice but to call in the LGD. Then they'll get mixed up and things'll get even crazier. Which is good for me.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But now we're done talkin.' Say good night, little prince.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Hey, excuse me. If you lay hands on Bison, I don't think we can call that punishing traitors anymore.
Why don't you just call it quits for today, hmm?
Who're you?!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Just a Messenger passing by.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...You look familiar. A Sankta with horns. You were makin' trouble for us earlier.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I'm honored.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: None of my Penguin Logistics reports ever mentioned you. Who are you?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Um... do I have to answer that?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'm just here looking for a lost package. Like a good Messenger would.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Mr. Capone, we got the place locked down. Everybody here's with you. She's on her own.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: What? Are you going to move or what?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Doesn't matter to me. I'm ready anytime.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hmph... a good Messenger.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Nah. The bolt's locked and loaded. We all got our own business to worry about.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Mr. Capone!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: If you wanna die, you're welcome to it.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: We do everything we gotta do to survive. Don't get it mixed up.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: ...And you don't have to talk so spooky. I'm really just an ordinary Messenger.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: A Sankta with a horn says she's ordinary? Who's gonna believe that one?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I got no reason to fight you. Do what you want.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: A minute ago you were ready to go stone cold killer, now you're just letting me go?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: That's how the mafia works. It's got all kinds of little exceptions I don't much like.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But if the princeling ain't gonna cooperate, and I can't kill him, I'll just have to find another way.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: We'll be seeing each other again tonight. Maybe.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Hopefully Gambino will have dealt with you by then. Or hey, the other way around works for me too.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: ...He really left.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You already got yourself out of the bindings, didn't you? Need a hand?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'm fine. I can get myself up. Thanks for the help, Mostima.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Where's everybody else?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Um.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Heh. Your face says it all. It's been a rough one.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...Their pace... it's kind of hard to keep up with.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I warned you. So you have any idea where they might be?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Texas said 'to the ends of the earth.' And that we'd meet up in an hour?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Okay. Sure. I'll take you there.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: The ends of the earth... what does that mean?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Um... The origin of the name has been lost to history, but now we can say it's one of the boss's assets. And it's like a base of operations for us.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: People come from all over, at least people moving in the underground circles.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: So it's like...?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: It's a bar.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Mostima, ma'am, what are we doing...?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: We're putting a sheet over ourselves and pretending to be one big ghost. It's the quickest and easiest costume.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: No, what I mean is, why do we have to dress up one big ghost...?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: So we can blend in with the Sauin atmosphere. People will think we're just going to a party or something.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: That 'Mr. Capone' may not have gone far.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Suddenly a black-horned Sankta wielding a staff comes out all aggressive and overbearing...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: A control freak like him is going to play it very carefully, right?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Y- yeah.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Speaking of your staff... I just noticed it. Are you an Arts user, Mostima?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: It's from a long time ago. I did actually get some serious training.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Pretty different from a certain lazy angel who sleeps all day.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Oh yeah...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: So you've known Exusiai for a long time.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Haha. We should have been able to have a nice noisy chat during your fun welcome party.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But the occasional explosion and ambush is par for the course for Penguin Logistics.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Is that right...?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Something else?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I was just thinking about how even a Messenger like Mostima has times like this... what with all the mysterious rumors swirling around...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Are you disappointed?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: No! Not at all! That was very impolite of me to say, I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I am a Penguin Logistics employee, after all. This great land is full of Messengers, in every nook and cranny. Adaptability is the first thing you should learn.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: There sure are a lot of first things in this business...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I just remembered, from here, we make a left, and then a right, then we go around the third alley here and... Yep. Shortcut.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's getting so late, but we only see more and more people coming out.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: That's the magic of Sauin.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Pretty neat, huh? There's floats and stands and parties, and even some stinky sewer steam, just over the wall.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...pretty neat. Yeah.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: We're on a tight schedule. We need to pick up the pace.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Is this a graveyard?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Yeah, only Lungmen would have a cemetery right in the center city like this.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Those people are all wearing funeral dress.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: That kind of solemn mourning makes me think of my time in Laterano.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Laterano... what's that place like?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You're very curious, aren't you?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I guess so. I just always wanted to see some faraway places.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: But somehow I never got the chance to get any international contracts... *sigh*.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Intercity networks are a lot more developed than they used to be. You should have a lot of chances to leave.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...and the farther away you go, the more meaningful the experience.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Is traveling from country to country very difficult?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hm... If I had to choose, I'd say the biggest problem is the Catastrophes. If you run into one, then all of Terra turns against you.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: There was this time that I left the Catastrophe Messenger's report at the transit station and I ran into one. I was a few hills away though.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: The black clouds billowing around, the sky itself threatening you, it feels awful. Truly awful.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Catastrophes... if you're in a nomadic city, you shouldn't get hit.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: There's a lot of other problems.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Cities move to avoid Catastrophes, sure, but that means the place you're trying to get can end up crawling away from you. Imagine that.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: That sounds pretty frustrating.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: So you better make friends with some Catastrophe Messengers. And don't oversleep when you've got a date with one.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...Hehe. Talking like this, it feels like we're coworkers, Mostima.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Oh, sorry, was that a bit much?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...Mostima?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...Hm? Oh. I was just thinking of something.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: We have to go through the graveyard. Step lightly.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Do you know the origin of Sauin?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Where did that question come from? I heard it had something to do with ancient Sarkaz sacrificial practices...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Sauin in fact comes from some ancient Sarkaz sacrificial rites, and long ago, the meaning of the name was even more complicated.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Most holidays have something to do with sacrifice or worship. It's just that people have been forgetting for a very long time.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: People welcome back the souls of the departed, soothe whatever lingering issues they may have with the living, and send them on back.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But nobody takes these things seriously anymore.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: The living sing and dance and dress up as ghosts. But the actual dead lay here in the graveyard, totally forgotten. It's not good.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: When the pressures of life get to be too much, it's kind of natural to want to do something to soothe yourself and forget...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: We've all been through a lot. A Catastrophe is the surest thing in the world, after all.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: When you watch those mourners give their flowers and sweep their graves, doesn't it make you feel a little more peaceful?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: By the way, Mostima, back there you said you were looking for a lost package...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Didn't I tell you?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Someone gave me a job with a big pile of cash, the job said 'take Bison to see the world.' Mmm. Real stylish job.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: D- dad...!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: And I'm testing you here. Your scores are up to me.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...it's so late. Nobody's out.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Oh, sweet child, growing up in my house, eating my food, and then going away just like that. Oripathy this, Oripathy that. You were always lost in your own thoughts.
attributes.name: Old Woman

attributes.content: Uncle Tung's doing well. Business is good. He brought an apprentice with him the last two days.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: You should be so lucky. Then you wouldn't make people worry. If you don't do good business, you have to...
attributes.name: Old Woman

attributes.content: Would you quiet down, mommy?
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: As hopeless as you? Light the candle already!
attributes.name: Old Woman

attributes.content: Where's my lighter... Oh, here it is.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: *Sigh* As soon as the stupid boy learned to smoke, he disappeared. Come to think of it, I never gave him a light. Too bad.
attributes.name: Old Woman

attributes.content: Too many candles. I'll light you a cigarette.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: You're really lighting a cigarette? Moron! Get a candle already!
attributes.name: Old Woman

attributes.content: Okay, okay, okay. Here.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Ah Faat...
attributes.name: Old Woman

attributes.content: Now now, no crying on Sauin. Let's go. It's late. Let's go home and have Little Tung make us some noodles.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Noodles at midnight?
attributes.name: Old Woman

attributes.content: ...Thank you kids for coming here. It's hard to see at night. You've been a great help.
attributes.name: Old Woman

attributes.content: ...No problem. It was on the way.
Oh. The wind.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's kind of chilly.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: A cool evening breeze, the sweet smell of candy, and the sparkling lights of the city, this is the best Lungmen has to offer.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Did you see that magnificent golden street? Like the midnight sun.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Yeah. Is that where we're going?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: East Sunset Boulevard 1301. The door has some giant penguin graffiti sprayed on it. You can't miss it.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: And I'm afraid you're on your own from here.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Penguin graffiti, got it... but where are you going, Mostima?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Well, I can't look after you forever, can I?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: That's true... But you kind of suddenly disappeared last time too...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Sorry about that. Let's just say I have other business to attend to.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You do your best to get along with the other kids.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: O- okay.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Good. See you around.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...Uncle Tung, what happened?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Ah Fil? I'm so glad you're okay. You hurry home as fast as you can!
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: Who was it? The man from the docks? The gang of kids?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: No, neither. You don't have to get involved this time. It was no big deal. Just a little setback.
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: Uncle.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: ...The old folks went to sweep Ah Faat's tomb. Not that you'd know, but he was like a grandson to them.
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: I saw them coming back and I thought I'd make some food for them. I ran into those men while I was bringing it...
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: Who did it?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: ...All I know is they weren't from Lungmen. Don't you get involved!
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: Right. Okay.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Ah Fil! It wasn't easy to get everything cleared up with the Oni...
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: To clear up the misunderstandings with Inspector Hoshiguma. I got you a job, didn't I? Don't blow this!
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: I know. Just rest up, Uncle.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: I'm going to find out what happened.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Ah FIl, damn it, come back here! Where are you going?!
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: ...Aiya! Why don't you listen?
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: Young people have their ways about them. You must be so proud.
...Lin? What are you doing here? Here to witness my shame?
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: You're Lungmen's premier finball master. You don't need to take a risk like this. Why not tell them?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Is the Rat King so important? If the people can't enjoy the finest finballs, what then?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Rules are rules.
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: We made the rules.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: ...They're still rules.
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: But you were beaten for no good reason. I don't plan to stay in hiding.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Pfah. Who knows what you're scheming!
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: Right. Let me help you up. You've been a finball master for so many years, have your skills dulled?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: I still have hands. I'll just need someone to watch. You'll do the honors?
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: All I want is to live my life in peace. If I take a beating, then I take a beating.
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: Hah hah. It's heartening to see such spirit in an old friend.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: You're the one they're after. What's heartening?
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: This is heartening.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: ...Don't you get tired of this?
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: Very tired, but we all have our responsibilities to bear. We carry a city on our shoulders.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Sell your finballs. Concern yourself with nothing else.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Can you walk? What would you say to a walk with me?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: I'm fine. It's no big... Aaaaaagh! What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: A flesh wound is still a wound. Same as you ever were, playing the tough guy.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: ...Let us speak no more of the past. This is the life you have chosen, and you have nothing to feel guilty for.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Your finballs are a part of Lungmen. A more important part than me.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: You are already free.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Then why do I never see you taking care of my business?
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: ...Let's talk about something else. How have you been lately?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: I've heard Lungmen cuisine is getting popular in Columbia. I thought I'd see about moving out there to...
attributes.name: Uncle Tung

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Lin
